articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar’s back spasm was maybe a psychological tactic against Pakistan: Saqlain Mushtaq on... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Remembering that iconic Test match which Pakistan won by 12 runs to take a 1-0 lead in the two-match series, former Pakistan off-spinner Saqlain Mushtaq said the back spasm was probably Sachin’s tactic to apply psychological pressure on the Pakistan bowlers.
articles.content: Sachin Tendulkar’s 136 against Pakistan in the 1st Test match at Chennai in 1999 is considered to be one of his best knocks. Sachin’s back spasm during that innings is as famous as his dazzling displ… [+2750 chars]

articles.title: Three Indians in Tom Moody’s World T20 XI; Rohit Sharma named as captain - SportsCafe
articles.description: Tom Moody, who coached SRH to its maiden IPL title in 2016, picked his best international T20 XI from across the world and picked three Indians, and also named Rohit Sharma as the captain. Nicholas Pooran is a surprise pick in Moody’s XI, while Jofra Archer a…
articles.content: David Warner, Rohit Sharma (C), Virat Kohli, AB de Villiers, Nicholas Pooran (wk), Andre Russell, Sunil Narine, Mitchell Starc, Rashid Khan, Jasprit Bumrah, Jofra Archer, Ravindra Jadeja (12th man)
